formattedAddress: 175 Varick St, New York, NY 10014, USA
adrFormatAddress: 175 Varick St, New York, NY 10014, USA

originalText.text: Denise and her team did an absolutely unbelievable job photographing our wedding. She and her PA were efficient, fun, and took the time and care to make every photo perfect. She turned our photos around very quickly (3-4 weeks!), and captured the essence of the day in a way that I didn't think possible. I promise- book with Modern Wedding Photography. You won't regret it, and will cherish the beautiful photos that come to you in no-time! (You will also really want to get a beer with your awesome photographer)

text.text: Denise and her team did an absolutely unbelievable job photographing our wedding. She and her PA were efficient, fun, and took the time and care to make every photo perfect. You won't regret it, and will cherish the beautiful photos that come to you in no-time! (You will also really want to get a beer with your awesome photographer)

originalText.text: Working with Denise was one of the best decisions we made for our wedding. Denise is incredibly talented, professional, and fun! Leading up to the wedding, she worked closely with us to understand our vision and priorities. She did an incredible engagement shoot with us in Central Park which was so special! The day of the wedding, she was relaxed but attentive, thorough but still felt our celebration was intimate. She was able to capture moments we weren't aware of. She turned around our photos quickly and they are beautiful! The wedding book she had made for us is out of this world. We love having this stunning book to show our friends and family. Denise did an amazing job making us comfortable and capturing our special day. We would recommend Modern Wedding Photography to everyone!

text.text: Working with Denise was one of the best decisions we made for our wedding. Denise is incredibly talented, professional, and fun! Leading up to the wedding, she worked closely with us to understand our vision and priorities. She did an incredible engagement shoot with us in Central Park which was so special! originalText.text: Denise and Modern Wedding Photography was an absolute pleasure to work with. She made everything easy, gave us options, was enthusiastic and passionate about the event, and did an absolutely flawless job on the day of our wedding.  She took control of the pre-wedding photos so they were fast and painless, but complete and awesome. She was organized and had done her homework to know exactly which photos, combos, etc. were expected. And then she took absolutely beautiful pictures throughout the ceremony and reception that captured the beauty, fun, love and excitement of the day.  Our proofs were available quickly and easily, she walked us through options for things like thank you cards and ordering photos, and she was helpful with recommendations and guidance in putting together our album, which was perfect.  We would highly recommend Modern Wedding Photography to anyone looking for a top rate photographer!

We would highly recommend Modern Wedding Photography to anyone looking for a top rate photographer!

originalText.text:
Denise was absolutely incredible. She captured our wedding perfectly from start to finish. We looked for someone who would capture the essence of our wedding with many candid shots of our guests, and not just formal posed pictures. And that is EXACTLY what we got. When we got our pictures (which she delivered in 3 weeks!) we felt like we got relive the night all over again. She captured all of the emotion and excitement of our wedding, discretely getting all up in the action. Her slogan is "You’ll be too busy having fun to know we were even there!" and that is absolutely the truth. Our pictures were stunning, unique and creative. We received so many compliments from those who saw them.

From the moment we met with Denise, we knew we wanted her to be our photographer. Throughout the entire planning process she was there to answer our questions, and to give advice on elements that didn't necessarily even have to do with photography (she's certainly seen her fair share of weddings, so her input was very valuable). In fact, many of our other vendors came from her recommendation. Whenever we emailed or spoke on the phone, she gave us all of her attention as if we were her only clients (and we certainly were not!).

Her pricing is very fair, and she offers multiple packages that can work with many budgets. I cannot recommend her enough!
